name: Fantasy Turtle of the Blood God
name_original: Fantasy Turtle of the Blood God
description:
CONTROLS

WASD or arrow keys to move. Drag right click to highlight troops, then drag left click to draw their formation. If your troops are not highlighted, left click to fire bullets at the cost of your health. Shift to slam into enemies.

CREDITS
  • Rubyleehs (twitter, itch.io) - programming and design
  • lostchocolatelab - sword clash sfx
  • InspectorJ - bamboo swing sfx
  • undead505 - grass footstep sfx
  • DCSFX - underwater loop sfx
BACKGROUND

The Blood God wishes to dominate the world, but is meet with resistance by the Holy Crusade. Through his Fantasy Turtle, the weakened Blood God transmits his commands to his army of cultists to destroy the Holy Cathedral.

MADE FOR GLOBAL GAME JAM 2018

The .zip file below follows the requirement of the jam, containing the source and executables.
